A mụrụ Scott na Monrovia ma bụrụ onye otu Grebo. O nwere nzere bachelọ na akụ na ụba na nzere iwu na Mahadum obodo Liberia
Scott bụ onye otu Liberian National Bar Association na onye guzobere Association of Female Lawyers of Liberia Ọ bụ osote Onye Ọkachamara na Louis Arthur Grimes School of Law na Mahadum Liberia.

A họpụtara Scott ka ọ bụrụ Chief Justice nke ndị otu ise nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu na afọ 1997, mgbe e guzobeghachiri ụlọ ikpe ahụ mgbe agha obodo na nhọpụta nke Charles Taylor gasịrị. N'ọnwa Febụwarị, na afọ 2003, Scott gụrụ mkpebi ikpe nke ụlọ ikpe nke kwuru na ọ nweghị ikike iwu n'elu ndị nnupụisi Liberians United for Reconciliation and Democracy iji kwụsị agha obodo nke abụọ iji mee ọnụ ọgụgụ mba tupu ntuli aka afọ 2003. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ n'ụlọ ikpe ruo n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2003, mgbe gọọmentị mgbanwe malitere.

Na ntuli aka nke afọ 2005, Scott ghọrọ Junior Senator maka Maryland County, na-anọchite anya Alliance for Peace and Democracy. N'afọ 2008, ọ gwara Truth and Reconciliation Commission okwu banyere mkpa ọ dị ile anya karịa ihe ndị mere na 1979. Ọ tụfuru oche Senate ya na ntuli aka afọ 2011.

Scott bụ onye isi oche nke Kọmitii Nnyocha Iwu nke gbakọtara site na afọ 2013 ruo afọ 2015. CRC gara mpaghara ntuli aka 73 niile ma nweta ngụkọta nke 56,729 n'aka ụmụ amaala. N'ọrụ a, Scott kwadoro maka ụmụ nwanyị itinye aka yana maka agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ agbọghọ. Scott gosipụtara akụkọ ikpeazụ nke Kọmitii ahụ nye Onye isi ala Ellen Johnson Sirleaf n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2015.

N'afọ 2016, a kpọrọ Scott aha dị ka otu n'ime ọtụtụ ndị ọkàikpe kwuru na ha bụ ndị ụgwọ ọjọọ site na Liberia Banker Association, nke kwuru na ọ kwụghị $ 11,241.04 nke ụlọ akụ Liberia maka mmepe na itinye ego ji.
